message: Bob, I'm happy to offer you this exceptional product for $1,200,000. It's a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'm looking to get out of the product.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900,000 is significantly lower than what I need to get for this product.  I'm willing to come down to $1,000,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you and it allows us both to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $950,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
